docs.lead_paragraph: For all the hand-wringing, there is immensely more classical music on offer now than there was in what nostalgists think of as the golden era of classics in America.

headline.main: Check the Numbers: Rumors of Classical Music's Demise Are Dead Wrong

docs.snippet: For all the hand-wringing, there is immensely more classical music on offer now than there was in what nostalgists think of as the golden era of classics in America.
